data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro Fall Creators Update Insider Preview Build
data.actual_result: It turns to new unreads just before it leaves the screen
data.expected_result: It should leave the screen without turning to new unreads
data.short_description: If you see the New Mentions button and scroll up to hide it. It turns to new unreads just before it dissapears.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server you have been mentioned on - Scroll Down so you see New Mentions - Scroll back up to hide it and observe how it turns to new unreads just before it leaves the screen
